meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Eric Nelson Emily Vandermeulen Salvo Candela Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6580.

td.p: Eric Nelson, a teacher and small business owner from Minneapolis, Minnesota
Emily Vandermeulen, a geographic information systems specialist from Owen Sound, Ontario, Canada
Salvo Candela, a university administrator from New York, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $26,100)

tr.td: (Alex: We will name a place for you--a town, a city. Keep in mind that that city has only one team in one of the major leagues--NBA, NHL, or NFL.)

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'John Paul Jones

Eric

$1,795
The Book of Mormon')
